title: Found: The Craft Cadence 3-in-1 jersey wallet, tiny handlebar satchel, & world-first N99 Polution Mask?
content:
Craft Cadence is far from a household name in the United States. But the company’s workmanlike designs have gained traction among the bike commuter crowd in London, where it originated. The designs reflect the UK’s rainy climate and the necessities of urban a-to-b riding. The textiles are coarse and waterproof; the bags are multi-functional and

author: Sam Anderson
